stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: ok. Let's start. My name is XXX01. What is your name?

stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: Mhm. What do you usually do on Mondays?

stage_1.text: Uhm. Mhm. I like mm novel or non-fiction non-fiction books. Mhm. Recently, I like. Mhm.

stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: I see. Do you buy those books, or, do you go to the library?

stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: I see. Mhm. Then, er after work at home at night, what do you do?

stage_1.speaker: candidate
stage_1.text: Mm. After work, I I go back to home go back home, and I have supper with my mother. And, usually, I watch ne news programs on T V. Mhm. And, usually, I listen to tape recor eh English tape on tape recorder. Mm.

stage_3.text: ok.
